description: Can you calculate how much more money coffee farmers would be paid by selling their crops through one system versus another?
title: Test Yourself | Math, April 3, 2013
title_page: Test Yourself | Math, April 3, 2013 - The New York Times
text:
Test your math skills with this question created by Patrick Honner at Math for America from the article “Coffee’s Economics, Rewritten by Farmers.”
After you’ve clicked “submit answer,” more information will appear.
